data.oai_dc:dc: Meteorological Data from White Mountain Peak

A weather station was installed on the summit of White Mountain Peak at an elevation of 14,246' in October 2003. Sensors measure temperature, relative humidity, barometric pressure, solar radiation, wind speed and direction. Data are recorded every 10 minutes.
